items.title: Broader indices underperform but 20 small caps gain 10-29%
items.description: Among sectors, Nifty Oil & Gas index added 4.3 percent, Nifty Realty index rose 2.5 percent, Nifty Auto, IT and Healthcare indices rose 1 percent each. However, Nifty Media index shed 1.7 percent and Nifty Metal index shed 0.6 percent.
